name: my-prayer-reminder
description: An extension to remind the prayer time (Malaysia only)

myPrayerReminder.timer.description: Enter the reminder timer. Default is 5 minutes before prayer times.

myPrayerReminder.zone.default: SGR01 - Gombak, Petaling, Sepang, Hulu Langat, Hulu Selangor, S. Alam
enum: JHR02 - Johor Bahru, Kota Tinggi, Mersing, Kulai
JHR04 - Batu Pahat, Muar, Segamat, Gemas Johor, Tangkak
KDH01 - Kota Setar, Kubang Pasu, Pokok Sena (Daerah Kecil)
